movies.title: Black Hawk Down
movies.plot: 160 elite U.S. soldiers drop into Somalia to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord and find themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.
movies.actors: Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore, Eric Bana

movies.title: Tenet
movies.plot: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.
movies.actors: Elizabeth Debicki, Robert Pattinson, John David Washington, Aaron Taylor-Johnson

movies.title: Resident Evil 2
movies.plot: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.
movies.actors: Ryan McCluskey, Oscar Pearce, Indra Ov√©, Anna Bolt

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies.actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

movies.title: The Godfather: Part II
movies.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
movies.actors: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
movies.actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

movies.title: 12 Angry Men
movies.plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
movies.actors: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam

movies.title: Thunder Force
movies.plot: In a world where supervillains are commonplace, two estranged childhood best friends reunite after one devises a treatment that gives them powers to protect their city.
movies.actors: Melissa McCarthy, Octavia Spencer, Jason Bateman

movies.title: Mortal Kombat
movies.plot: MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.
movies.actors: Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson
